abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn extended his hostile tender offer for Lions Gate Entertainment on Tuesday and the company responded by saying the offer has once again been rejected by shareholders.

lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn once again extended his hostile tender offer for Lions Gate Entertainment on Tuesday and the company responded by saying the offer has once again been rejected by shareholders, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Icahn Extends His Hostile Bid for Lions Gate
